name: DeleteProtectedBranch
description: Delete a branch without force push permission.
author: Joost Voskuil (joost@foxhole.nl)

inputs.name: repositoryname
inputs.label: Repository Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The repository name where the branch should be deleted.

inputs.name: onlygitflow
inputs.label: Only support GitFlow
inputs.helpMarkDown: When enabled users can only delete release/* & hotfix/* branches. If false, user can delete every branch.

inputs.name: branches
inputs.label: Branches to delete
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branches to delete, Seperate tags with a ','. Example: release/release3.2
